attributes.action: Stop Theresa May from dragging the UK into her own vendetta & war with Russia
attributes.additional_details:
It would appear that Theresa May, along with others are hellbent on WW3 with Russia and its allies.

If it’s not the poisoning Sergei Skripal and his daughter in March, that she automatically blamed on the Russians and still not providing any concrete proof to the public domain, it’s the alleged Chemical Attack on Douma by Bashar al-Assad, who surprise surprise is backed by Russia.

Not one shred of concrete proof has been publicly shown of either event being linked 
to the Russians, but still..
attributes.background:
Theresa May is dangerously close to taking the UK unwittingly into a war against Russia.

The times come to declare a vote of no confidence in May and her cabinet and seek new leadership.
